key_risks: Dependence on blockbuster films for financial performance
Market saturation in mature regions like North America
Technological competition from streaming services and home entertainment
Regulatory and political risks in China
Anti-corruption compliance risks, including FCPA violations
controversies: Failed acquisition of IMAX China due to regulatory and political challenges
environmental_issues: Energy-efficient theater systems and sustainable film production practices
governance_issues: Anti-corruption compliance risks and potential FCPA violations
